attributes.action: Refund all University student their student fees and cancel all exams!
attributes.additional_details:
University students are becoming crippled with debt and having to pay for university and accommodation which they aren’t staying at or getting any support or teaching contact hours. 
Students are further struggling with mental health and struggling to do exams and assignments with 0 teaching hours face to face and 0 support from teachers.
attributes.background: Cancel all university tuition fees and student accommodation contracts and refund all fees and accommodation payments. Cancel all exams and assignments for University students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
